text: 20:19 will hopefully be the year that I
finished my goal of visiting every
country in the world so I thought it'd
be important to discuss exactly how much
it cost I spent a long time trying to
figure this out as there are so many
ways to spend money but all things
considered I estimate each country to be
about 700 US dollars this includes long
stays like 4 months in India and short
saves like 1 day in Monaco it includes
all transportation like flights trains
buses taxis car rentals
I'm sure been skiing we're about the
Sutter epic six-day road trip across
California cable cars took Tok for
cruising around scenery of Cambodia in a
tip tip
motorbikes bicycles canoes ferries and
cruise ships it covers all
accommodations like Airbnb
hotels guest houses welcome please
stumbles and hospitals and then a
shoebox it takes care of extra
activities like gorilla checking in
Uganda oh man that was incredible island
hopping in the Philippines skydiving in
Australia and safaris in Namibia and
finally it includes other expenses like
food shopping deer visas SIM cards just
got a SIM card here in Uganda ATM fees
etc some countries are really expensive
to visit like Bhutan North Korea and
Norway while others are really cheap
like Laos Bangladesh and Belarus but all
things considered I am confident with my
answer of $700 per country which is
about a hundred and thirty five thousand
dollars total to see every country in
the world as a solo traveler it's really
not that expensive when you think about
it considering it's the same price as
this car an Audi rs5 if you ask me it's
a no-brainer which one is more valuable
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world it's electric it's sexy its
tasty it's confusing but above all its
futuristic the Japanese are innovators
they somehow
